name: Case Process Viewer
description: This Axon Ivy component visualizes the current progress of a running process by highlighting the active task as well as all completed tasks directly within the process diagram.

descriptions.value: This Axon Ivy component visualizes the current progress of a running process by highlighting the active task as well as all completed tasks directly within the process diagram.
Diese Axon-Ivy-Komponente visualisiert den aktuellen Fortschritt eines laufenden Prozesses, indem sie die aktive, sowie alle abgeschlossenen Tasks direkt im Prozessdiagramm hervorhebt.
